title: How to Make a Christmas Star with Hangers

steps.title: Gather the things you will need:
steps.content: Gather the things you will need: 16 child sized hangers (larger can be used, but child size works best) Zip ties, preferably in a color that blends well with the color of the hangers. Christmas decorations such as garland, string of lights, ornaments, etc. Clippers/nippers/heavy scissors to cut the ends of the zip ties.

steps.title: Place two hangers with longest sides together and hooks facing the same direction, zip tie them together, and clip the ends of the zip ties flush with the fastener.
steps.content: Place two hangers with longest sides together and hooks facing the same direction, zip tie them together, and clip the ends of the zip ties flush with the fastener. You will need eight pairs (16 hangers total).

steps.title: Place four of the hanger pairs together, with the hooks pointing away from the center.
steps.content: Place four of the hanger pairs together, with the hooks pointing away from the center.

steps.title: Zip tie together at the center and at points where the hooks touch.
steps.content: Zip tie together at the center and at points where the hooks touch. Clip the ends of the zip ties flush with their fasteners. Create two of these.

steps.title: Place the second set of four hanger pairs atop the first as shown to create an eight pointed star.
steps.content: Place the second set of four hanger pairs atop the first as shown to create an eight pointed star.

steps.title: Zip tie both layers together at the center and at the points where the hooks rest under the long sides of the hangers atop them.
steps.content: Zip tie both layers together at the center and at the points where the hooks rest under the long sides of the hangers atop them.

steps.title: Use the cut sections of pipe cleaner/chenille stems to fasten your lights, garlands and ornaments to your star frame.
steps.content: Use the cut sections of pipe cleaner/chenille stems to fasten your lights, garlands and ornaments to your star frame.
